snippet: The new collection, “Garlic in Fiction,” includes fiction as well as work that appeared in women’s magazines of the 1940s and ’50s.
abstract: The new collection, “Garlic in Fiction,” includes fiction as well as work that appeared in women’s magazines of the 1940s and ’50s.

headline.main: New Collection of Shirley Jackson Works to Be Published
headline.print_headline: New Collection of Works By Shirley Jackson
